en: By the fig and the olive

ar: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَنَ فِى أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ
en: We have certainly created man in the best of stature;
Then We return him to the lowest of the low,

ar: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّلِحَتِ فَلَهُمْ
en: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds, for they
for they will have a reward uninterrupted.
So what yet causes you to deny the Recompense?
Is not Allah the most just of judges?
